Class GameState

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class GameState
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents the state of a game.

      static class  GameState.Dificulty
      Enumerate the difficulty of game: EASY - Dragon can´t move, MEDIUM - Dragon can move and sleep, HARD - Dragon can olny move
